Collection.name: Records
Collection.type: Eamon.ThirdParty.BTree`1[[Eamon.Framework.IArtifact, Eamon, Version=1.6.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null]], Eamon, Version=1.6.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: battle axe

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: It is one heavy, sharp and deadly battle axe.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: large tree

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: Inspecting the tree, you find some steps carved into the tree, which lead up.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: window opening

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: The opening looks like a window, though it is placed very high up the cliff wall.

Simple.name: StateDesc
Simple.value: lying sprawled on the ground

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: dead bat

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: Now that the bat is dead, you can get a better look at it. It is not a pretty sight.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: The forest seems dense. You can't see much from here.

Simple.name: StateDesc
Simple.value: shining a strong beam of light to the south over the ocean

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: big lamp

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: It is a big lamp, which seems to shine magically in one direction. There is a button on it.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: It is a circular button.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: tall cliff

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You look west towards the cliffs and see a small opening high up on the cliff wall. It looks like a window, as if there was a cave inside the cliff.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: The beautiful sea stretches south towards the horizon.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: cosy beach

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: The beach lies on the southeastern corner of this island. The white sand and the clear water looks lovely.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: The bridge crosses the ravine to the north. It seems as if some figure is standing on th middle of the bridge. It is however, hard to tell from this distance.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: wide ravine

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: The ravine blocks all progress to the north from this island to the main land further north. Luckily there is a bridge spanning the ravine.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: huge tree

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: The tree seems huge, even from this distance. There appears to be a platform of some sort up in the tree, though it is hard to see it through the leaves and branches.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: wooden platform

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: There appears to be a platform up in the tree but it from here, it is hard to see since the branches and leaves block the view.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: creaky stair

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: The creaky stairs appear safe enough.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: The sky is clouded so you can't really see the sun.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: The clouds make it impossible to see the sun, and later this evening, the stars.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: beams of the sun

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: The beams of the sun cannot penetrate the thick layer of clouds.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: barren plain

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: The plain is completely barren. Nothing seems to grow here.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: wand of lightning

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: The wand of lightning seems to be magical and you don't know how to activate the magic, so it is close to useless to you.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Lisa's dead body

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: Lisa is lying lifeless on the ground.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: big club

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: It is a huge club, too huge to be an effective weapon for anyone smaller than a ogre.

Simple.name: StateDesc
Simple.value: sticking out of the mud

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: There is something sticking out of the mud. It seems to be some sort of handle.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: body of the swamp monster

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: The huge body of the swamp moster lies covered in slime. It seems to be sinking into the bubbling mud, though very slow.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: silver sword

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: It is a beautiful sharp silver sword, which should come in handy in combat.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: body of a man

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: Something is happening! The werewolf shrinks and its fur vanishes. It also goes through some sort of shape transformation. After a while the process is over. Now lies the body of a dead man in front of you!

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: necklace with a locket

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: It is a gold necklace with a locket. You briefly open the locket and see that there is a hair inside. You close the locket again.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: There is a bin in the corner. It appears to be bolted to the wall. You can probably open it.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: It is both long and sharp. It is probably an effective weapon. You may ready it.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: A sturdy branch is lying on the ground.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: It is a standard shield, which you obtained while you were adventuring in the land of the mountain king.

Simple.name: StateDesc
Simple.value: lying sprawled on the ground

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: body of the unarmed warrior

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: The warrior's body lies sprawled on the ground. It looks as if that plate armor would suit you!

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: plate armor

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: It looks as if this plate armor will suit you.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Super Gun

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: Very dangerous!

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: entry door

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: Your hear the doors being locked from the outside. There is no way back now. You will have to defeat the Mountain King!

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: The bushes are beautiful with flowers in many colors.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: red berry

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: The red berries have a mesmerizing smell.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: The ravine is deep and wide. The only way to cross it is over the bridge.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: The wooden bridge is the only way to cross the ravine. Out on the middle of the bridge stands a huge creature - probably an ogre.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You cannot see it clearly from here. Go north to get a closer look.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You cannot see it clearly from here. Go north to get a closer look.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: It is a large wooden platform. It is hard to see anything else from down here.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: The branches are very far up in the tree. You cannot reach them from here.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: It is a very deep and wide ravine. There is no way to cross it from here, but to the west there appears to be a bridge.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: The tall dark cliffs block any progress in eastern directions.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: The tall dark cliffs block any progress northeast and southeast. East lies the entrance to the cottage.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: It looks as if the cottage could fall apart any minute. If you dare to enter, the entrance is to the east.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: entrance door

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: The door is open so you can enter the cottage by going east.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: The cliffs block all progress to the east.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: It looks like a nice, cosy and peaceful beach. The water to the south looks inviting.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: The water is clear and clean. This could be quite a paradise if it wasn't for that horrible mountain king...

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: The sand is white and beautiful. You have no use for it though.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: Among the rocks stands a huge lighthouse looming threateningly under the dark sky. You may enter through the open doorway to the south.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: The huge rocks which surround the lighthouse prevent any movement around the lighthouse.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: An open doorway without a door leads south into the lighthouse.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: Due to the darkness inside, you cannot see much of the cave from here.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: The entrance looks dark and uninviting.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: The huge cliff blocks movement in southern and western directions. Here, at the middle of the cliff is an entrance into a dark cave.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: The bubbling mud is soft enough to drag you down if you stop moving about.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: The few sick trees are completely without any leaves and look as if they have never been growing.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: The bridge lies some distance to the east so you can't see much from here.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: The branches block most of the light from the cloudy sky, so it is rather dark inside the forest.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: The trees stand rather close in this forest, making it rather dark in here.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You can hardly see the sky from within the forest. The trees are standing too close.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: The ravine blocks all progress in northern directions.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: The light comes in through an opening high up on the east wall and is reflected by crystals in the ceiling.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: The opening is high above your reach on the east wall. Light comes in through the opening and is reflected by the crystals in the ceiling. As a result the cave is brightly lit everywhere.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: The ceiling consists of many colored crystals. When the light through the opening hits the crystals, the light is spread evenly around the cave.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: The crystals in the ceiling are far above your reach. They help spread the light evenly around the cave.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: The cave is quite big with a domed ceiling and an opening far up the east wall. It is mostly empty except from a bin in one corner.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: The water is very clear. This could really be a paradise if it wasn't for those squids!

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: The cottage seems stable enough once you are inside. There isn't much furniture, just a cupboard, a table and a few chairs.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: There isn't much furniture here, only a cupboard, a table and a few chairs.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: The cupboard contains mostly books and some useless junk.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: The dining table is rather small, though up to four people could be seated around it.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: dining table

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: The dining table is rather small, though up to four people could be seated around it.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: A few chairs are placed around the table. You find nothing useful.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: The letters are completely different from those you learned on Eamon so the books have no value to you.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: The hole is in the center of the platform, and is quite wide so that both the tree trunk and a big man can pass through.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: The tree stretches far down through the hole in the center of the platform and many meters up above the platform. The lowest hanging branches are still way out of your reach.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: The platform is rather wide. Still it isn't recommended to be fighting up here. The view is magnificent though.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: The trunk of this tree is rather wide here, where it passes through the hole in the middle of the platform.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: The bridge is long and wooden. It seems sturdy enough.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You prefer not to look down as it makes you dizzy. But you can see that it is rather wide. Unfortunately, you are only halfway.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: The castle walls block all progress north. Beyond the castle you see the tall mountains which are part of the Mountain King's domain.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: the castle walls are overgrown with beautiful bushes filled with flowers and a few berries.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: There are many beautiful flowers in various colors.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: The marble stairs lead up to the north and into the castle of the Mountain King.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: The bridge lies to the south. If you don't feel fully prepared, it is not too late to turn back...

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: There are many torches along the walls. Right now they are not important.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: Beneath each torch is a statue of marble. They look very heavy and expensive. But right now they are not important.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: The marble throne sits on a dais in the eastern end of the room. The Mountain King is between you and the throne...

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You are in a long hall, brightly lit by torches on the walls. The room is fairly empty except from statues placed along the walls underneath the torches and the throne in the east end of the hall.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: There are many torches along the walls and there are statue beneath each of them. But right now, none of this is important.

Collection.name: FreeUids
Collection.type: System.Collections.Generic.List`1[[System.Int64, mscorlib, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b77a5c561934e089]], mscorlib, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b77a5c561934e089
